The mira- culous deliverance of the holy Apostle took place near the Latin gate of Rome, which led towards Latium.

Thus were partly fulfilled the words of our Saviour to the brothers S. J ames and S. John, when they declared that they were able to drink of the cup which He should drink3 ‘⁶ Ye shall indeed drink of My cup.” “ Do we ask,’' says S. Jerom, “how James and John the sons of Zebedee drank of the
